title: US Ad spending still expected to grow in 2023 despite 'stressful economic signals'
summary: A major ad forecaster said advertising is still expected to grow in 2023 despite mixed economic signals, a resiliency that industry pros say would have been unlikely during earlier periods of turbulence.

title: U.S. Ad Spending Still Expected to Grow in 2023 Despite 'Stressful Economic Signals'
summary: Media owners' U.S. ad revenues are expected to grow 3.4% to $326 billion next year, according to a new forecast from Magna.
